channel.title: Tor Browser Update Dilemma
channel.description:
Recently it came to my attention that when Tor Browser gets updated by using the "Check for Tor Browser update" menu from the browser itself, a new version (Currently: 5.0.3) is therefore installed. Now the issue is WhonixCheck, still recommends to update the already updated browser! So, is it only me or WhonixCheck ignores the Tor Browser's built-in update mechanism and always recommends to install a newer one from scratch?
Am I missing something?

item.title: Tor Browser Update Dilemma
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Yes. Ignore Tor Browser Updater (Whonix). Using Tor Browser Internal Updater is enough and recommended. Will be explained in next version of Whonix.
https://phabricator.whonix.org/T400

Read full topic
